# tasmapr

The goal of tasmapr is to provide background maps of Tasmania for R leaflet. 

# Install

```{r, eval=FALSE}

```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to make an awesome map!

```{r example, }
library(tasmapr)
tasmap()

```
